description: This file defines access control permissions based on user roles within a Flutter application, providing methods to verify access rights and perform navigation guards, as well as a widget to display an unauthorized message.

classes.name: AppPermissions
classes.description: Contains role-to-route mappings and methods for permission checking and navigation guarding.

classes.name: UnauthorizedPlaceholder
classes.description: A widget that displays an unauthorized access message.

methods.name: canAccessRoute
methods.description: Checks if a given role has access to a specific route.

methods.name: guardAndNavigate
methods.description: Performs permission check before navigation; shows a SnackBar if access is denied.
